text: Chelidonura pallida is a species of sea slug, or "headshield slug", a marine opisthobranch gastropod mollusk in the family Aglajidae.Rosenberg, G. (2012). Chelidonura pallida. Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=599342 on 2012-06-04 Chelidonura pallida ==References== ==External links== * Chelidonura pallida at SeaSlug Forum Category:Aglajidae Category:Gastropods described in 1951
title: Chelidonura pallida
